SmoothVegetationResidual.description: This tool can smooth the residual roughness due to vegetation cover in LiDAR DEMs.
SmoothVegetationResidual.github: Source code is unavailable due to proprietary license.

i.name: Input Digital Elevation Model (DEM) Raster
i.description: Name of the input digital elevation model (DEM) raster file.

output.name: Output Raster File
output.description: Name of the output raster file.

max_scale.name: Maximum Search Neighbourhood Radius (grid cells)
max_scale.description: Maximum search neighbourhood radius in grid cells.

SortLidar.label: Sort Lidar
SortLidar.description: Sorts LiDAR points based on their properties.

i.name: Input LiDAR Points
i.description: Name of the input LiDAR points.

output.name: Output LiDAR Points
output.description: Name of the output LiDAR points.

criteria.name: Sort Criteria:
criteria.description: Sort criteria e.g. 'x 50.0, y 50.0, z'; criteria may include x, y, z, intensity, class, user_data, point_source_id, and scan_angle

SplitLidar.name: SplitLidar
SplitLidar.label: Split Lidar
SplitLidar.description: Splits LiDAR points up into a series of new files based on their properties.
SplitLidar.github: Source code is unavailable due to proprietary license.

i.name: Input LiDAR Points
i.description: Name of the input LiDAR points.

criterion.name: Split Criterion
criterion.description: Criterion on which to base the split of the input file. Options include 'num_pts, 'x', 'y', 'z', intensity, 'class', 'user_data', 'point_source_id', 'scan_angle', 'time'

min_pts.name: Minimum Number of Points
min_pts.description: Minimum number of points in an output file

SplitVectorLines.name: SplitVectorLines
SplitVectorLines.label: Split Vector Lines
SplitVectorLines.description: Used to split a vector line coverage into even-lengthed segments.

i.name: Input Lines
i.description: Name of the input lines shapefile.

output.name: Output Lines
output.description: Name of the output lines shapefile.

SvmClassification.name: SvmClassification
SvmClassification.label: Svm Classification
SvmClassification.description: Performs an SVM binary classification using training site polygons/points and multiple input images.

inputs.name: Input Predictor Rasters
inputs.description: Names of the input predictor rasters.

scaling.name: Scaling Method
scaling.description: Scaling method for predictors. Options include 'None', 'Normalize', and 'Standardize'

training.name: Input Training Polygons/Points
training.description: Name of the input training site polygons/points Shapefile.

field.name: Class Field Name
field.description: Name of the attribute containing class data.

output.name: Output Raster File
output.description: Name of the output raster file.

gamma.name: Kernel Gamma
gamma.description: Gamma parameter used in setting the RBF (Gaussian) kernel function.

tolerance.name: Tolerance
tolerance.description: The tolerance parameter used in determining the stopping condition.

test_proportion.name: Test Proportion
test_proportion.description: The proportion of the dataset to include in the test split; default is 0.2.

dem.name: Input Digital Elevation Model (DEM) Raster

output.name: Output File
output.description: Name of the output raster file.

background_hgt_offset.name: Offset Height of Background (z-units)
background_hgt_offset.description: Offset height of background, in z-units.

background_clr.name: Background RGB colour
background_clr.description: Background red-green-blue (RGB) or red-green-blue-alpha (RGBA) colour, e.g. '[255, 255, 245]', '[255, 255, 245, 200]'

attenuation.name: Attenuation Parameter
attenuation.description: Attenuation parameter. Range is 0-4. Zero means no attenuation.

ambient_light.name: Ambient Light
ambient_light.description: Ambient light parameter. Range is 0.0-0.7. Zero means no ambient light.

z_factor.name: Elevation Multiplier
z_factor.description: Elevation multiplier, or a vertical exageration.

dev_max.description: Do you want to use DEVmax instead of DEV for measuring local topographic position?
